ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)

cookingTips: Add liqueur after cooking and cooling slightly to preserve aromatic alcohol notes
Whisk egg mixture constantly over gentle heat to reach safe internal temperature
Chill immediately after straining to stop residual cooking and develop texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user master a classic French custard with an orange liqueur finish. Focus on tempering technique and proper cooling to prevent splitting.
